San Francisco - full time

Massive Health is a small start-up of just 12 people that's based in San Francisco, and combined our team has previously shipped products to over half a billion people. Led by cofounder and CVO Aza Raskin, we're using this consumer product expertise to improve healthcare by creating beautiful tools that deliver useful insights for getting and staying healthy. We've already launched an app called The Eatery, and there's lots more to come.
